SELECT A.MessageID AS "MessageID" , A.Version AS "Version" , A.FolderID AS "FolderID" , A.MenuID AS "MenuID" , A.Subject AS "Subject" , A.BodyText AS "BodyText" , A.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , A.CreatorCode AS "CreatorCode" , A.OwnerCode AS "OwnerCode" , A.CreateDate AS "CreateDate" , A.BannerTitle AS "BannerTitle" , A.BannerSubTitle AS "BannerSubTitle" , A.BannerText AS "BannerText" , A.BannerImageOption AS "BannerImageOption" , A.BannerBoardOption AS "BannerBoardOption" , A.BannerOpenOption AS "BannerOpenOption" , A.BannerLinkOption AS "BannerLinkOption" , A.LinkURL AS "LinkURL" , A.SortKey AS "SortKey" , FilePath AS "FilePath" , SavedName AS "SavedName" , FullPath AS "FullPath" FROM ( SELECT BM.MessageID , BM.Version , BM.FolderID , SOF.MenuID , BM.Subject , BM.BodyText , BM.RegistDate , BM.CreatorCode , BM.OwnerCode , BM.CreateDate , BMUV.UF_Value0 AS BannerTitle , BMUV.UF_Value1 AS BannerSubTitle , BMUV.UF_Value2 AS BannerText , CASE WHEN (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM board_userform_option BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value3) = 0 THEN 'Basic' ELSE 'Dark' END AS BannerImageOption , CASE WHEN (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM board_userform_option BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value4) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS BannerBoardOption , CASE WHEN (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM board_userform_option BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value5) = 0 THEN 'New' ELSE 'This' END AS BannerOpenOption , CASE WHEN (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM board_userform_option BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value6) = 0 THEN 'This' ELSE 'Link' END AS BannerLinkOption , (SELECT BUV.FieldValue FROM board_userform_value BUV WHERE BUV.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND BUV.Version = BM.Version AND BUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUV.UserFormID = BU.UserFormID) AS LinkURL , CASE WHEN (SELECT BMUV.UF_Value8 FROM dual WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(BMUV.UF_Value8, '^[0-9]+$')) IS NOT NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(BMUV.UF_Value8) ELSE 999 END AS SortKey , SF.FilePath , SF.SavedName , REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode)|| SF.FilePath|| SF.SavedName AS FullPath FROM sys_object_folder SOF INNER JOIN board_message BM ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN board_message_userform_value BMUV ON (BM.MessageID = BMUV.MessageID AND BM.Version = BMUV.Version) AND BMUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN board_userform_option BUO ON BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value3 LEFT OUTER JOIN board_userform BU ON BU.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BU.SortKey = 8 LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_file SF ON SF.ServiceType = 'Board' AND SF.ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND SF.ObjectType = 'FD' AND SF.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SF.SaveType != 'INLINE' AND SF.Version = BM.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID WHERE SOF.FolderID = #{folderID} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR BM.ReservationDate < TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND NVL(BM.SecurityLevel, 999) >= (SELECT BM.SecurityLevel FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode})
AND (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM board_userform_option BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(BUO.OptionName, '')) = BMUV.UF_Value9) = 0 AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' ) A ORDER BY A.SortKey ASC, A.RegistDate ASC

SELECT P.UserCode AS "UserCode" , P.MailAddress AS "MailAddress" , P.PhotoPath AS "PhotoPath" FROM
SELECT #{userCode} AS UserCode FROM DUAL
U LEFT JOIN sys_object_user P ON U.UserCode = P.UserCode
SELECT #{userMail} AS MailAddress FROM DUAL
U LEFT JOIN sys_object_user P ON U.MailAddress = P.MailAddress

SELECT (SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM DUAL) AS "FolderName", MessageID AS "MessageID", FolderID AS "FolderID", Version AS "Version", Subject AS "Subject", CreateDate AS "CreateDate", CreatorCode AS "CreatorCode", CreatorName AS "CreatorName", UseIncludeRecentReg AS "UseIncludeRecentReg", RecentlyDay AS "RecentlyDay", MenuID AS "MenuID", IsRead AS "IsRead", FileID AS "FileID" FROM ( SELECT SOF.MultiDisplayName, BM.MessageID, BM.FolderID, BM.Version, BM.Subject, TO_CHAR(BM.CreateDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CreateDate, BM.CreatorCode, CASE WHEN BM.UsePubDeptName = 'Y' THEN Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorDept) ELSE Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorName) END AS CreatorName, NVL(BC.UseIncludeRecentReg, BCD.UseIncludeRecentReg) AS UseIncludeRecentReg, NVL(BC.RecentlyDay, BCD.RecentlyDay) AS RecentlyDay, SOF.MenuID, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_message_reader WHERE MessageID = BM.MessageID AND ReaderCode = #{userCode}) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IsRead, (SELECT MAX(FileID) FROM sys_file WHERE ObjectType = 'FD' AND ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SaveType = 'IMAGE') AS FileID FROM board_message BM INNER JOIN sys_object_folder SOF ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT JOIN board_config BC ON BM.FolderID = BC.FolderID LEFT JOIN board_config_default BCD ON SOF.FolderType = BCD.FolderType WHERE 1=1 AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A')
AND MsgType IN ('O', 'C', 'M')
AND MsgType IN ('N', 'B')
AND ( (SOF.FolderType = 'OneToOne') AND (BM.OwnerCode = #{userCode} OR (SELECT OwnerCode FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER WHERE FolderID = SOF.FolderID) LIKE '%'||#{userCode}||';%' ) OR (SOF.FolderType != 'OneToOne') ) AND NVL(BM.SecurityLevel,999) >= (SELECT SecurityLevel FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}) AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection}
AND BM.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND ';'||#{menuID}||';' LIKE '%;'||SOF.MenuID||';%'
AND NVL(BC.UseIncludeRecentReg, BCD.UseIncludeRecentReg) = 'Y'
AND ROWNUM <= 6 ORDER BY BM.RegistDate DESC ) RESULT

SELECT ProcessArchiveID AS "ProcessArchiveID" , PerformerID AS "PerformerID" , WorkitemArchiveID AS "WorkitemArchiveID" , FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" , InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , UserCode AS "UserCode" , UserName AS "UserName" , SubKind AS "SubKind" , FormSubKind AS "FormSubKind" , FormID AS "FormID" , FormName AS "FormName" , EndDate AS "EndDate" , RealEndDate AS "RealEndDate" FROM( SELECT MAX(ProcessArchiveID) AS ProcessArchiveID , MAX(PerformerID) AS PerformerID , MAX(WorkitemArchiveID) AS WorkitemArchiveID , MAX(FormPrefix) AS FormPrefix , MAX(InitiatorID) AS InitiatorID , MAX(InitiatorName) AS InitiatorName , MAX(InitiatorUnitID) AS InitiatorUnitID , MAX(InitiatorUnitName) AS InitiatorUnitName , MAX(UserCode) AS UserCode , MAX(UserName) AS UserName , MAX(SubKind) AS SubKind , MAX(FormSubKind) AS FormSubKind , FormID , MAX(FormName) AS FormName , MAX(EndDate) AS EndDate , MAX(RealEndDate) AS RealEndDate FROM ( SELECT CompleteList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.FormID , C.FormName , TO_CHAR(B.EndDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate FROM JWF_WorkitemArchive A INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessArchive B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescriptionArchive C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE 1=1 AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' ) CompleteList
UNION ALL
SELECT RejectList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.FormID , C.FormName , TO_CHAR(B.EndDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate FROM JWF_WorkitemArchive A INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessArchive B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescriptionArchive C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE 1=1 AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T109','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_02' ) RejectList ) CompleteAndRejectList GROUP BY FormID ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY RealEndDate DESC

SELECT BM.MessageID AS "MessageID" , BM.Version AS "Version" , BM.FolderID AS "FolderID" , SOF.MenuID AS "MenuID" , BM.Subject AS "Subject" , BM.BodyText AS "BodyText" , BM.LinkURL AS "LinkURL" , BM.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , BM.CreatorCode AS "CreatorCode" , BM.OwnerCode AS "OwnerCode" , BM.CreateDate AS "CreateDate" , BUO.SortKey AS "OpenType" , SF.ServiceType AS "ServiceType" , SF.FilePath AS "FilePath" , SF.SavedName AS "SavedName" , (REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode)||SF.FilePath||SF.SavedName) AS "FullPath" FROM sys_object_folder SOF INNER JOIN board_message BM ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN board_message_userform_value BMUV ON (BM.MessageID = BMUV.MessageID AND BM.Version = BMUV.Version) AND BMUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN board_userform_option BUO ON BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value0 LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_file SF ON SF.ServiceType = 'Board' AND SF.ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND SF.ObjectType = 'FD' AND SF.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SF.SaveType != 'INLINE' AND SF.Version = BM.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID WHERE SOF.ObjectType = 'Board' AND SOF.FolderType = 'LinkSite' AND SOF.FolderID = #{folderID} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.MsgType != 'S' AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR BM.ReservationDate < TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND NVL(BM.SecurityLevel, 999) >= (SELECT BM.SecurityLevel FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}) AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' ORDER BY BM.CreateDate ASC

SELECT SiteLinkID AS "SiteLinkID" , UserCode AS "UserCode" , SiteLinkName AS "SiteLinkName" , SiteLinkURL AS "SiteLinkURL" , SortKey AS "SortKey" , Thumbnail AS "Thumbnail" FROM sys_site_link WHERE SiteLinkID = #{siteLinkID}

mapper.select: SELECT CommentID AS "CommentID" , MemberOf AS "MemberOf" , TargetServiceType AS "TargetServiceType" , TargetID AS "TargetID" , Comment_ AS "Comment" , Context_ AS "Context" , LikeCount AS "LikeCount" , ReplyCount AS "ReplyCount" , RegisterCode AS "RegisterCode" , RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate" , Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" , Reserved3 AS "Reserved3" , Reserved4 AS "Reserved4" , Reserved5 AS "Reserved5" , (SELECT COUNT(L.LikeID) FROM sys_like L WHERE TargetServiceType = 'Comment' AND CommentID = L.TargetID AND L.RegisterCode = #{userCode}) AS "MyLikeCount" FROM sys_comment WHERE TargetServiceType = #{targetServiceType} AND TargetID = #{targetID} AND DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(MemberOf, 0), CommentID), CommentID
